alert.note: Alert for Ida; Woodbury (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:00PM CDT until August 18 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHEROKEE...NORTHEASTERN WOODBURY...SOUTHEASTERN PLYMOUTH AND NORTHWESTERN IDA COUNTIES... At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kingsley, or 14 miles southeast of Le Mars, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Pierson around 715 PM CDT. Correctionville and Washta around 725 PM CDT. Quimby around 730 PM CDT. Cushing around 735 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
